Title: Mystic Pizza
Writer: Amy Holden Jones (story), Amy Holden Jones (screenplay), Perry Howze (screenplay), Randy Howze (screenplay), Alfred Uhry (screenplay)
Actors: Annabeth Gish, Julia Roberts, Lili Taylor, Vincent D'Onofrio
Plot: Sisters Kat and Daisy work along with Jojo at the pizza parlour in Mystic, Connecticut. Kat, shortly off to Yale, finds herself drawn to a local architect she is babysitting for, while her more tearaway sister starts dating a guy from the money side of the tracks. Jojo leaves her man at the altar; she loves him but shies away from commitment. Meanwhile the fame of the pizza continues to spread; it seems to contain something almost ..... mystic.
